subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: The president at Penn State, Rodney Erickson, said no one had been hired as the football coach, and David Joyner, the acting athletic director, who is leading the search, said there was no top candidate.
snippet: The president at Penn State, Rodney Erickson, said no one had been hired as the football coach, and David Joyner, the acting athletic director, who is leading the search, said there was no top candidate.
